text: Ithi, “wozani nginitshele lokho iNkosi yenu eyanenqabela kona, ukuthi ningayenzeli abahlanganyeli ekuyikhonzeni nenze okuhle kubazali futhi ningazibulali izingane zenu ngenxa yobuphofu, thina siyanondla kanye nabo futhi ningasondelani nobubi lobo obusobala nalobo obufihlakele futhi ningawubulali umphefumulo awenza uMvelinqangi kwangabi semthethweni (ukuwubulala) ngaphandle kweqiniso, lokhu waniphoqa ngakho ukuze nisebenzise umqondo”
